concept.description: Returns the top 10 artifacts regarding the number of contained types.
concept.cypher: MATCH (a:ARTIFACT)-[:CONTAINS]->(t:TYPE) RETURN a.FQN as Artifact, COUNT(t) as Types ORDER BY Types DESC LIMIT 10

concept.description: Returns the top 10 packages regarding the number of contained types.
concept.cypher: MATCH (p:PACKAGE)-[:CONTAINS]->(t:TYPE) RETURN p.FQN as Package, COUNT(t) as Types ORDER BY Types DESC LIMIT 10

concept.description: Returns the top 10 types regarding to the number of declared methods (including constructors).
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:TYPE)-[:DECLARES]->(m:METHOD) RETURN t.FQN as Type, COUNT(m) as MethodCount ORDER BY MethodCount DESC LIMIT 10

concept.description: Returns the top 10 types regarding to the number of declared fields.
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:TYPE)-[:DECLARES]->(f:FIELD) RETURN t.FQN as Type, COUNT(f) as FieldCount ORDER BY FieldCount DESC LIMIT 10

concept.description: Returns the top 10 types regarding the number of other types they depend on.
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:TYPE)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(dependency:TYPE) RETURN t.FQN as Type, COUNT(dependency) as Dependencies ORDER BY Dependencies DESC LIMIT 10

concept.description: Returns the top 10 types regarding the number of other types depending on them.
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:TYPE)<-[:DEPENDS_ON]-(dependent:TYPE) RETURN t.FQN as Type, COUNT(dependent) as Dependents ORDER BY Dependents DESC LIMIT 10
